futureBass.name: Duskus
futureBass.desc: Simon White, better known as Duskus is a British, London-based electronic music producer and DJ. He is known for his cute sound and formant shifted vocal processing.

futureBass.name: Losi
futureBass.desc: This Vancouver producer is on San Holo's Bitbird label and is known for his sound that is 'made to move air.'

futureBass.name: Sem
futureBass.desc: Sem's style is upbeat and melodic. He hasn't realeased anything in a while, but stay tuned for more!

futureBass.name: Laxcity
futureBass.desc: Laxcity's organic sound is one to check out. He also makes different genres on his 'B sides' soundcloud account.

futureBass.name: Cella
futureBass.desc: Cella is one to watch in 2020.

futureBass.name: Quiet Bison
futureBass.desc: This guy sounds like Flume's son.

bassHouse.name: Born Dirty
bassHouse.desc: With an eclectic mix of influences, Born Dirty has created a signature hybrid sound resting on a solid backbone of Hip-Hop, House and Techno.

bassHouse.name: Jace Mek
bassHouse.desc: Jace mek has a dirty rave sound.
